title: 5 dead, more than 640,000 without power in southern U.S. after storms rip through region
description: Five people are dead and more than 640,000 households across the South were without power Sunday afternoon as storms and extreme weather continued to rip through the region, according to the tracking website PowerOutage.us.

title: Ukraine recaptures southeastern village as long-awaited counteroffensive rumbles on
description: Ukrainian forces have recaptured a village in the country’s southern Zapororizhzhia region, a Russian installed official said Sunday, in one of Ukraine's first gains since it launched a counteroffensive earlier this month.

title: Map: How vulnerable is your neighborhood to extreme heat?
description: This map shows how at risk your neighborhood is during heat waves, according to the data.

title: 4 people killed, dozens injured in chaotic night of mass shootings across the country
description: At least 4 people were killed and more than two dozen others injured in shootings in Illinois, Missouri and Washington state in a deadly night of gun violence.

title: A Navy base put up a wall to ward off stray bullets. Locals say that doesn't to solve gun violence.
description: When gunfire damaged homes on a military base in Gulfport, Mississippi, officials put up a wall of shipping containers to block stray bullets.

title: Despite brand boycotts and backlashes, Pride events see solid corporate support
description: Some brands are pulling out of Pride events, especially in areas with anti-LGBTQ legislation, but many more are holding firm or deepening their support for the community.

title: Meet the Black outdoorsy groups reclaiming the joys of nature
description: Black people across the country are enjoying the outdoors by forming their own communities of nature enthusiasts.

title: Ron DeSantis leverages his Covid response for a foothold in Nevada
description: Some Nevada Republicans — still reeling from state closures during the pandemic — like Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis' Covid messaging.
